Player History
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 3/3/1990 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/27/1990 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Injured on 4/15/1991 with a Bruised Finger, out for 5 days...

Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/3/1993, off Jeff Bittiger (NYM)...
